text:
I'm ignoring Twitter today, or until all of the usual anti-Brexit, anti-Boris, #FBPE #ToryScum brigade who have transferred their expertise and outrage to #coronavirus stop trying to prove how clever they are by talking about how confused they are

Laters 👍
